Articles.Content:
http://kerbal-tutti.blogspot.com/2014/12/r4pt0r-won-be-99-stock-for-090.html

someone copied and archived the first post of a thread I made a while back.

http://kerbal-tutti.blogspot.com/ seems they do that to a lot of threads :/ whats up with that?

Probably a form of spam where bots take information from a large, high ranking website (such as this forum) and post it to the other website in the hopes of it gaining search ranking with Google, so it can earn money from advertisement.
Wow, that looks authentic. Only a little bit though.

Wow, that looks authentic. Only a little bit though.

Better than "Look for FAR Kerbal Space Program Authentic Solutions here. See Solutions for FAR Kerbal Space Program here. Tutorials for FAR Kerbal Space Program. Webmaster, your site could be getting more views every day on your FAR Kerbal Space Program post blog!"
Dude, why did you not keep the 99% stock title thing?
Probably some business called kerbal, that's my best guess
